# Getting Started

## Quick start

1. Clone the repository
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/Arpit-K-Sharma/hydra-cardano-yaci
   cd hydra-cardano-yaci
   ```

2. Install prerequisites
   ```bash
   npm run install:prerequisites
   ```

3. Generate keys
   ```bash
   npm run generate-keys
   ```

4. Start devnet
   ```bash
   npm run start:devnet
   ```
